sentences.en: A new circular viewing plane reflection hologram is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种新的周视平板反射全息图制作原理与拍摄方法.

sentences.en: For example: caihong holographic radiotheraphy retarder � � s, multi - color, true color hologram computer - generated hologram.
sentences.cn: 例如: 彩虹全息 、 三维众色、消色不对 、 假不黑白全息图、筹算机制全息图等.

sentences.en: He added that the missing hologram should have been detected by electronic surveillance.
sentences.cn: 他还说,电子监视设备本应该发现漏印了全息防伪标志.

sentences.en: He brought up a hologram into the air over his computer terminal.
sentences.cn: 他用电脑终端把把一副全息图投射到空气中.

sentences.en: Hologram ( Holograph ): A three - dimensional image created by lasers. There are different types of holograms.
sentences.cn: 全息图: 用激光产生的 立体 影像. 全息图有多种.

sentences.en: No one knows what it would mean for us if we really do live in a hologram, yet theorists have good reasons to believe that many aspects of the holographic principle are true.
sentences.cn: 如果我们确实生活在一张全息图中，没人知道这对我们究竟意味着什么。 但理论学家有很好的理由相信全息原理的很多方面是真实的。

sentences.en: One may also discover one's hologram swapped out for another.
sentences.cn: 你也可能发现你的全息图被和别人所交换.

sentences.en: Rainbow hologram is based on the characteristics of light diffraction phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 彩虹全息图像的拍摄是根据平的衍射本体共性获得的.

sentences.en: The eye is a hologram reflecting the human body.
sentences.cn: 眼睛其实是反映我们身体的万花筒.

sentences.en: The hologram can be flipped to show the inverse image.
sentences.cn: 全息图可以通过反转显现出逆像。

sentences.en: The hologram package is the functional unit embodying the universality of hologram.
sentences.cn: 全息包是体现全息普遍性的功能单位.

sentences.en: The hologram sits in the heart chakra region of the human form.
sentences.cn: 全息图位于人类的心脏脉轮区域.

sentences.en: The property of peak wavelength of slanted reflection hologram grating was discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了倾斜条纹反射全息光栅的波长特性.

sentences.en: The resulting pattern was something he called a hologram after the Greek word holos meaning whole.
sentences.cn: 所得到的图样他称之为全息图,这个字来自希腊字holos意思 是“全部”.

sentences.en: The worse the photopolymer shranks, the worse is the hologram reconstructed.
sentences.cn: 理论分析表明,材料收缩越严重,全息图再现质量越差.

sentences.en: They entered the room, and Halsey studied the hologram.
sentences.cn: 他们进入房间, 哈尔茜博士研究全息影像.

words.tran_cn: 全息术；全息摄影；[摄][激光] 全息照相术

phrases.tran_cn: 体积全息照相；体积全息图

trans.tran_cn: 全息图， 全息照片， 综合衍射图， 原样录象
trans.tran_en: a kind of photograph made with a  laser  that looks as if it is not flat when you look at it from an angle
